name: Swarmony
description:
A short game about a swarm of balls, working in harmony (get it?) to get a big ball to a goal. Simple and fun, a cool game made by cool people if I do say so myself. I've nothing further to say because it is late (or early I suppose) and I am tired.

Code and most of the graphics by me (robotabc773) and Great_Guy96, title and title graphic by Guilloteen12, music by Koopstrooper, brainstorming and moral support by Shenanigans, Bruce Wayne, AEMARR, and firebolt973

Note - The game may fade out and then not fade back in when switching levels when using the Web version. This shouldn't be a problem with any of the downloadable copies, and a simple refresh should make the game normal again, though you will lose your progress.
